content.text:
[@alanz](@ZcjYF92reFjUtEYdoJ8ulOI6N6klwAAaIkghEEHdvSE=.ed25519)

This is a super interesting message, which client did you use to write it? The `root` property usually references a message but in your message it references a feed. In Patchwork it's showing up as if you forked a discussion but the "discussion" is a link to @Rby5rb94o4BWeNFYPh3brIxfKj3dC8b+da56JybXWIU=.ed25519. Weird.
